message.name: HTTP_400_CASEID_OR_PERSONID_REQUIRED
message.locale: You must provide either case_id or person_id.

message.name: HTTP_404_PROFILE_PHOTO_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The requested profile picture was not found or you are not authorized to view the picture.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_PAYMENT_RECORD_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for payment_id (%1n). Specify a valid payment_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_APPLICATION_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for application_type_id (%1n). Specify a valid application_type_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_PROGRAM_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for programId (%1n). Specify a valid programId and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_NO_PROGRAMS_SELECTED
message.locale: You must select at least one program.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_FORM_ID_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for form id (%1n). Specify a valid form id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_FORM_IDS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The id for the intake application form is not associated with the id for the submission form.

message.name: HTTP_400_NO_SUBMISSION_SCIPT
message.locale: The application_form_id (%1n) is related to an application type which has not been configured with a submission script, and therefore cannot be submitted online.

message.name: HTTP_400_PROGRAM_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: The programId (%1n) is not related to the application_type_id (%2n) and cannot be included as part of the application.

message.name: HTTP_400_PROGRAM_ALREADY_PENDING
message.locale: An application with an application_type_id of (%1n) is already pending for programId (%2n), and this program does not allow multiple applications.

message.name: HTTP_400_APPLICATION_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: A draft application with an applicationtypeId of (%1n) is already in progress. This must be deleted before starting a new application of this type.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_WITHDRAW_APPLICATION_NO_REASON_INFORMED
message.locale: No reason for the application withdrawal has been informed.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_WITHDRAW_APPLICATION_MULTIPLE_REASONS_INFORMED
message.locale: Either withdrawalReason or reasonText need to be informed for the application withdrawal. Not both.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_WITHDRAW_APPLICATION_INVALID_REASON_FOR_APPLICATION_TYPE
message.locale: The informed withdrawalReason is invalid for the application type of the application_id (%1n).

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_APPLICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for application_id (%1n). Specify a valid application_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_SUBMITTED_APPLICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for submitted_application_id (%1n). Specify a valid submitted_application_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_ASSOCIATED_APPLICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No associated application_form_id was found for submitted_application_id (%1n).

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_DRAFT_APPLICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for draft_application_id (%1n). Specify a valid draft_application_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_APPLICATION_PROGRAM_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for application_program_id (%1n). Specify a valid application_program_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_APPLICATION_NOT_PENDING_CANNOT_WITHDRAW
message.locale: The application id (%1n) is not on pending state. Only pending applications can be withdrawn.

message.name: HTTP_400_PARTIALLY_COMPLETED_APPLICATION_SUBMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: The application form (%1n) can only be submitted when completed. Complete the form before resubmitting it.

message.name: HTTP_404_IMAGE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The requested image was not found.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_LOCAL_OFFICE_SEARCH_TYPE_NOT_INFORMED
message.locale: One of either Zip Code or County must be entered when searching for local offices.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_LOCAL_OFFICE_SEARCH_MULTIPLE_TYPES_INFORMED
message.locale: Only one of either Zip Code or County can be entered when searching for local offices.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_SUBMITTED_APPLICATION_ID_OR_DRAFT_APPLICATION_ID_NOT_INFORMED
message.locale: At least one of either submitted_application_id or draft_application_id should be informed.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_SUBMITTED_APPLICATION_ID_AND_DRAFT_APPLICATION_ID_BOTH_INFORMED
message.locale: Only one of either submitted_application_id or draft_application_id should be informed.

message.name: HTTP_400_QUERY_PARAMS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: If the 'page' query parameter contains a value, then the 'page_id', 'record_id', 'parent_id' and 'action' query parameters must not be used.

message.name: HTTP_400_NO_ACTION_PARAM_VALUE
message.locale: If the 'page_id' query parameter contains a value, then the 'action' query parameter is mandatory.

message.name: HTTP_400_EDIT_PARAMS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: If the 'action' query parameter contains a value of 'edit', then the 'page_id' parameter is mandatory, and 'parent_id' and 'page' parameters are not applicable

message.name: HTTP_400_ADD_PARAMS_NOT_VALID
message.locale: If the 'action' query parameter contains a value of 'add', then the 'page_id' parameter is mandatory, the 'parent_id' parameter is optional, and 'record_id' and 'page' parameters must not be used.

message.name: HTTP_404_INTAKE_APPLICATION_ATTACHMENT_COULD_NOT_BE_GENERATED
message.locale: An attachment document could not be generated for the Intake Application with applicaton_id (%1n).

message.name: HTTP_404_REFERRAL_ACTIVITY_ATTACHMENT_COULD_NOT_BE_GENERATED
message.locale: A referral attachment document could not be retrieved for the activity with citizen_activity_id (%1n).

message.name: HTTP_400_PARAM_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The value of %1s is not a valid value for the parameter in which it is being used.

message.name: HTTP_404_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for activity_id (%1n). Specify a valid activity_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_ACTIVITY_COMMENT_LONGER_THAN_ALLOWED_LIMIT
message.locale: The comment entered exceeds the allowed limit of (%1n).

message.name: HTTP_401_CONTACT_DETAILS_NOT_AUTHORISED
message.locale: User is not authorized to view the contact details for this activity.

message.name: HTTP_404_CONTACT_DETAILS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Contact details not found.

message.name: HTTP_400_ACCOUNT_PARAMS_MISSING_OR_INVALID
message.locale: Some of the account parameters were missing or invalid.

message.name: HTTP_400_USERNAME_ALREADY_IN_USE
message.locale: The username '%1s' is already in use.

message.name: HTTP_404_PDF_FORM_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The pdf_form_id (%1n) could not be found.

message.name: HTTP_400_PDF_FORM_NOT_ASSOCIATED_TO_INTAKE_APPLICATION_TYPE
message.locale: The pdf_form_id (%1n) is not associated to the application_type_id (%2n).

message.name: HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN
message.locale: The authenticated user is not permitted to perform the requested operation.

message.name: HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN_APPLICATION_SUBMISSION
message.locale: The configuration of the application requires the user to be logged in to a citizen account before submitting the application.

message.name: HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN_CHANGE_OWNERSHIP
message.locale: The authenticated user is not permitted to owner this motivation

message.name: HTTP_404_NO_EMAIL_ADDRESS_REGISTERED
message.locale: No email address found on the system for the specified username.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_RESETTING_PASSWORD_WITH_SECRET_QUESTION
message.locale: Invalid username, secret question type, secret question answer, new password or confirm new password.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_RESETTING_PASSWORD_WITH_EXISTING_PASSWORD
message.locale: Invalid existing password, new password or confirm new password.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_SYSTEM_PROPERTY_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for property_name (%1s). Specify a valid property_name and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_SUBMISSION_SCRIPT_NOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: The submission script for this application has not been completed. Please complete the submission script before trying to create an application.

message.name: HTTP_400_ERROR_COMPLETED_FORM_ACCESS
message.locale: Cannot read or modify details of a form when it has been marked as completed.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_SCREENING_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for screeningTypeId (%1n). Specify a valid screeningTypeId and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_ERROR_FORM_EXECUTION_ID_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for execution id (%1n). Specify a valid execution id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_PROGRAM_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Program with type reference '%1s' not found.

message.name: HTTP_401_SCREENING_FORM_ID_NOT_AUTHORISED
message.locale: User is not authorized to view the screening results for this formId.

message.name: HTTP_404_SCREENING_FORM_ID_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for formId (%1n). Specify a valid formId and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for lifeEventContextId (%1n). Specify a valid lifeEventContextId and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_IEG_SCRIPT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The IEG Script '%1s' was not found.

message.name: HTTP_404_DATASTORE_SCHEMA_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No Datastore Schema was associated with the IEG script '%1s'.

message.name: HTTP_500_ERROR_PARSING_RULESET
message.locale: Error parsing ruleset.

message.name: HTTP_401_APPEALS_NOT_AUTHORISED
message.locale: User is not authorized to view appeals data.

message.name: HTTP_404_ATTACHMENT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The attachment was not found.

message.name: HTTP_404_APPEAL_SCRIPT_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An IEG Script for online appeals has not been defined.

message.name: HTTP_404_APPEAL_SCHEMA_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: A data store schema for online appeals has not been defined.

message.name: HTTP_404_APPEAL_SCHEMA_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: A data store schema for online appeals has not been found.

message.name: HTTP_404_APPEAL_CASE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No cases found for the user to appeal.

message.name: HTTP_404_COMMUNICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The communication was not found.

message.name: HTTP_401_MOTIVATION_NOT_AUTHORISED
message.locale: User is not authorized to create the motivation.

message.name: HTTP_404_VERIFICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The verification specified does not exist.

message.name: HTTP_403_CASE_ACCESS_NOT_AUTHORISED
message.locale: The authenticated user is not permitted access to this case.

message.name: HTTP_400_IDS_SPECIFIED_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: At least one of the identifiers provided does not exist.
